A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best word I can think to describe The Last Jedi is \"surprising.\" While The Force Awakens was a movie based on the familiar structure of A New Hope and introduced us to new characters\, The Last Jedi turns what might have been expected on its head. I didn't feel like I could predict what would happen in the story the way I could in a normal blockbuster movie or The Force Awakens. I don't remember the last time I felt that way while watching a big budget mega-franchise movie. It's incredibly different for a Star Wars movie\, and I think it is on par with the original trilogy in terms of quality. It may not be what you expect\, but in a world where formulas dominate movies across all genres\, and everyone's trying to build a cinematic universe as soon as they can\, it's a huge breath of fresh air.
